DOC.brief_summary: To compare intravenous magnesium sulfate oral nifedipine acute tocolysis preterm labor
DOC.brief_title: Magnesium Sulfate Versus Nifedipine Acute Tocolysis Preterm Labor : A Prospective , Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: : Uterine contraction cervical change rupture membrane preterm gestation placental abruption , fetal distress , placenta previa , maternal medical contraindication tocolysis
